attributes.action: do everything in his power to ensure that ALL websites which incite crimes against the person, especially sex crimes, are shut down and cannot be re-opened
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I read of a case in which a rapist attacked two women after being "inspired" to do so by some sort of rapists' website.  This is obviously appalling and totally unacceptable; please ensure that such an abomination can never happen again!
